summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2013 NISSAN ALTIMA. WHILE OPERATING THE VEHICLE, THE AIR BAG SENSOR INDICATOR SOMETIMES REMAINED ILLUMINATED. THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO CORCORDVILLE NISSAN (452 WILMINGTON WEST CHESTER PIKE IN GLEN MILLS, PA 19342) WHERE IT WAS DIAGNOSED THAT THE PASSENGER SIDE AIR BAG CONTROL MODULE WAS FAULTY AND NEEDED TO BE REPLACED. THE FAILURE WAS NOT REPAIRED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOTIFIED, BUT NO ASSISTANCE WAS OFFERED. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 43,000. *TT  THE CONSUMER STATED TOOK THE VEHICLE TO PORTER NISSAN WHERE THE AIRBAG WAS REPAIRED.  *TR
